description: The lightweight Men's Wiley Fleece Jacket is a great layer for unpredictable weather. Breathable Polartec® Classic 300 weight fleece wicks away sweat so you stay dry without feeling weighed down. Zippered hand and chest pockets provide ample storage for on-the-go essentials. Built-in Angel-Wing Movement™ will keep your arms moving comfortably even when this jacket is worn over a base layer.
name: Marmot Wiley Jacket - Mens
